ModMetadata.Name: ToxicTitan
ModMetadata.Author: MerGatto
ModMetadata.Description:
[h1]ToxicTitan[/h1] [b]WARNING:[/b] This is a StationeersMods Plugin Mod. It requires Bepinex to be installed with the StationeersMods plugin. See: https://github.com/jixxed/StationeersMods
[h2]Description[/h2] ToxicTitan is my attempt at creating a more challenging alternative to Europa, inspired by [b]vivi[/b] and [b]murk[/b]. This version features two different weather events: [list] [*][b]Acid Methane Rain (Volatiles)[/b] - Most commonly occurring. [*][b]Snow Storms[/b] - Less frequent but still hazardous. [/list] These world settings can function independently, but for the intended experience, installing [url="https://github.com/jixxed/StationeersMods"]StationeersMods[/url] is recommended.
[h3]Features with StationeersMods Installed[/h3] [list] [*]The [b]first weather event[/b] occurs [b]after 1 day[/b] instead of 7. [*]The [b]first weather event[/b] is always [b]Acid Rain[/b]. [*][b]Acid Rain[/b] and [b]Snow Storms[/b] do [b]not[/b] trigger forced follow-up events (e.g., 'Regular' rain). [/list]
For an added challenge, consider using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3336803492]Free Lunch's Structure Thermodynamics mod[/url] alongside this world.
[h2]Gameplay Tips[/h2] [list] [*][b]Prepare early![/b] Weather events will start quickly, so prioritize creating a [b]safe storage space[/b]. [*][b]Beware of airlocks![/b] Acid Rain leaves [b]liquid volatile puddles[/b], which do [b]not[/b] count towards room pressure. Use a [b]custom airlock script[/b] or a [b]manual airlock with a liquid drain[/b]. [*][b]Solar power is ineffective[/b] due to frequent storms, but [b]wind power is reliable[/b]. [*][b]Coal is rare on the surface[/b] but can be found using [b]deep miners[/b]. [*][b]Oxite ice is scarce[/b], but [b]Nitric ice can substitute[/b] for furnace usage. [*][b]Leverage the cold atmosphere[/b]â€”[b]Gas Fuel Generators[/b] are easier to set up. [/list]
[h2]Credits[/h2] [list] [*][b]vivi[/b] - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198187662981/]Steam Profile[/url] [*][b]murk[/b] - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/iammurk]Steam Profile[/url] [*][b]jixxed[/b] - Creator of [url=https://github.com/jixxed/StationeersMods]StationeersMods[/url] [*][b]pardeike[/b] - Creator of [url=https://github.com/pardeike]Harmony[/url] [/list]
[b]Enjoy the challenge![/b] Feel free to contribute or provide feedback!
